reviews.title: Read This Helpful Comprehensive Review!!!
reviews.content: Hello fellow traders!I'm here to provide an honest review of my recent experience with MFFU. I was recently drawn to their limited-time 30k static account, and after signing up, I started to face some challenges with the account setup and credit card verifications. These issues, though very frustrating and tilting, were quickly addressed by their exceptional support team, one of whom I would like to leave a special thanks to, TradeSage & Spidy along with the tech team, who basically held my hand throughout the process in patiently helping me investigate and resolve each of my problems. Having had experiences with other futures prop firms, I can confidently say that this level of customer support is rarely seen, so much so that it's almost like a fairy tale. Their proactive support, engagement, and commitment to helping traders have set a new standard for me in the futures prop firm industry. The thorough support from TradeSage & Spidy along with the tech team left a deep impression on me, which added significant value to my experience with MFFU. Personally, it's reassuring to know that should I encounter any urgent issues, their team is there to help me. Now, beyond my recent experience, I'd like to dive into why I've chosen to trade exclusively with MFFU. As a trader who's been funded by firms like Apex, Blusky.pro, and TakeProfitTrader, and currently managing 10 $100k funded accounts with Apex, I believe I have some experience to provide a meaningful review to those reading about why I believe what MFFU offer is a lot better to the other prop firms out there.First, MFFU's expert evaluation plans offer unmatched flexibility. This contrasts sharply with other firms, where you'll have to deal with daily loss limits and additional trading rules that can be restrictive, such as consistency rules, scaling rules, etc. Other prop firms also have activation fees as well, and depending on whether it's a forever monthly or a lifetime one-time fee, they're both a lot more expensive than MFFU's expert evaluation plans.MFFUs provide a straightforward yet effective approach to all of this, where they don't have a daily loss limit, consistency, or scaling rules, and there are no activation fees, which I personally found refreshing and a lot more trader-friendly. With all of these benefits, their drawdown is also end-of-day, not your usual unrealized trailing drawdown. If you were to take a look at what MFFU's expert evaluation plans offer, you'd quickly realize that there's not a single prop firm that offers anything remotely close to what MFFU has. Second, the funded account rules and payout process at MFFU are a lot more streamlined and trader-focused. Their rules are simpler, focusing on avoiding drawdowns, not trading during major news events, and avoiding yolo and gambling trades. Their payout structure is straightforward and generous, with a 90/10 split after the first $10k every 14 days.Coming from Apex, I find MFFU's payout policy a lot simpler to follow and less restrictive, especially since MFFU eliminates unnecessary hurdles like scaling plans, mandatory trading days, and consistency rules, which, quite frankly, offers traders the freedom to trade as they see fit. With the first $10k of profit, every 14 days being completely yours, that gives you a potential of having over $100k being completely yours before the split. Additionally, the 14 days aren't 14 trading days but 14 calendar days, giving you the opportunity to take trades when you see your setup. Finally, without the consistency rules, MFFU allows you to capitalize on trading your edge and take advantage of runners, something that Apex and other prop firms will not let you do. Overall, I would like to conclude this review by saying my recent experience with MFFU has been nothing short of fantastic. Their support, particularly from TradeSage & Spidy along with their tech team, has been exceptional. The platform, with its user-friendly and modern dashboard, along with its flexible trading rules, aligns very closely with the freedom of trading a personal account. This unique combination of support, flexibility, and trader-friendly policies is why I decided to transition to trade exclusively with MFFU. For those reading my reviews, I hope you found it helpful, and I encourage you not to sleep on MFFU and take a look at what they have to offer. MFFU doesn't only provide you with an opportunity to get funded, but also an environment that respects and supports your trading style. I would like to thank MFFU and TradeSage & Spidy + their tech team once again for providing me with invaluable trading experience!

reviews.title: Very happy with MFFU
reviews.content: I have been a long-time customer of MFFX (excellent CFDs prop firm) and when they created MFFU, I decided to test their services. Their offer on “Futures” solves many problems compared to the competition (Topstep, Apex, etc.) and is therefore extremely interesting and advantageous. The first asset of MFFU is their support chat (many thanks to Olivier and Dave), very professional and competent. No matter your question, you will have a precise answer. The second advantage is the support for more serious problems by the customer manager (Fytte). We had to resolve a problem together and Fytte was extremely understanding and attentive. Special thanks to Luvai too. Payouts are extremely simple and quick from the moment you verify on Riseworks. Finally, if you follow their Discord, you will be sure not to miss their great promotions. You will also have access to all the information necessary to optimize your trading. In summary, MFFU's offer is complete and professional.
